Package org.apache.juneau.common.utils

package org.apache.juneau.common.utils
  • Class
    Description
    AsciiMap
    Stores a Map of ASCII characters to Strings in a quick-lookup array.
    AsciiSet
    Stores a set of ASCII characters for quick lookup.
    AsciiSet.Builder
    Builder class.
    FileReaderBuilder
    Utility class for creating FileReader objects.
    FileWriterBuilder
    Utility class for creating FileWriter objects.
    IOUtils
    Various I/O related utility methods.
    PathReaderBuilder
    Utility class for creating Path-based Reader objects.
    Snippet
    Identical to Runnable but the run method can throw stuff.
    StringUtils
    Reusable string utility methods.
    SystemUtils
    System utilities.
    ThrowableUtils
    Various utility methods for creating and working with throwables.
    ThrowableUtils.SupplierWithThrowable<T>
    Interface used with Utils.safeSupplier(SupplierWithThrowable).
    ThrowingSupplier<T>
    A supplier that throws an exception.
    Utils
    Common utility methods.
